de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.client

Interface ClientFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultClientFacade

    public interface ClientFacade
    Facade for an NA(A/R) to submit new connections and connection changes to a TNC(S/C).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void notifyConnectionChange(TransportConnection connection, ConnectionChangeType change)
      Notifies the TNC(C/S) about a connection change of the given connection.
      void notifyGlobalConnectionChange(ConnectionChangeType change)
      Notifies the TNC(C/S) about a global change concerning all connections.
      void start()
      Starts the client facade.
      void stop()
      Stops the client facade.

    • Method Detail

      • notifyConnectionChange

        void notifyConnectionChange(TransportConnection connection,
                          ConnectionChangeType change)
        Notifies the TNC(C/S) about a connection change of the given connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection from the NA(A/R)
        change - the change type

      • notifyGlobalConnectionChange

        void notifyGlobalConnectionChange(ConnectionChangeType change)
        Notifies the TNC(C/S) about a global change concerning all connections.
        Parameters:
        change - the change type

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the client facade.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the client facade.
